name: Austin Restaurant Scores
description: Query Austin/Travis County Health Department restaurant inspection scores.

name: Hack Task Aggregator
description: Application to aggregate tasks across projects that are identified for "hacking".

name: Instabus
description: Realtime map of Austin's public transit. Works well on mobile and desktop.

name: Vote ATX
description: Voting place finder for Austin/Travis County elections.

name: Austin Green Map
description: Map of Austin's parks that is easy to search and works offline.

name: Austin Parks Acreage
description: Visualize and compare the distribution of parks, recreational facilities, and green spaces in Austin.

name: Austin Recycles
description: Application that provides service information for City of Austin trash and recycling pickup.

name: 311 vs 10-ONE
description: Visualization of 311 service calls broken down by 10-ONE city council district.

name: TEC Filer
description: A system for filing campaign finance reports required by the Texas Ethics Commission.

name: Bike Buddy
description: Connecting people who want to try bicycle commuting with experienced bicycle commuters who want to help. A May 2013 Austin Bike Month initiative.

name: Cycle Nearby Austin
description: Location aware map of City of Austin resources and bicycle relate police report.

name: Green Map - Interactive Map of Austin's Parks
description: iOS app with map Austin's parks that is easy to search and works offline.

name: Socrata Data Portal Analytics
description: Suite of tools for analyzing Socrata data portal site metrics and metadata.

name: District Enricher
description: Enrich an existing dataset with city council district information.

name: How to Use the City of Austin Open Data Portal
description: "How-To" tutorials that show basic and common tasks on the City of Austin Open Data Portal.

name: Open Austin Data Portal
description: Data published by Open Austin.

name: Cute Pets Austin
description: A "Twitter bot" that posts a random adoptable pet from the Austin Animal Center.

name: Civic Project Directory
description: Directory of civic projects produced by Open Austin participants.

name: Open Gov Datasets by Department/Category
description: Report on datasets published on the City of Austin Open Data portal, updated nightly.

name: Civic Project CFAPI Data Feed
description: Registry of civic projects suitable for end users, produced by Open Austin participants, in CFAPI format.

name: LIVES
description: Data feed of restaurant inspection scores for Austin/Travis County in LIVES format.
